keyPolicies.policyDescription: Build more homes and encourage home ownership for first time buyers, allow housing association tenants to buy their homes
Cut tax so you can make your own choices. Less red tape so businesses can create jobs and prosperity
An in-out referendum on Europe. No other party can or will let YOU decide
Improving local transport including extending the Bakerloo Line; and lobbying for 4G for SE16

issues.brexitEurope: An in-out referendum on Europe. No other party can or will let YOU decide
issues.economy: Cut tax so you can make your own choices. Less red tape so businesses can create jobs and prosperity

housing.content: Build more homes and encourage home ownership for first time buyers, allow housing association tenants to buy their homes
